hope::final

hope::final< T > Class Template Reference

Implementation of the struct like non recursive tuple which might be used to directly cast to struct with same fields because alignment of the structs's fields and tuple's fields are match. More...

#include <log_helper.h>

Inheritance diagram for hope::final< T >:

List of all members.

Classes

struct  final
 Policy, used to specify how to convert struct to tuple. If instance of this structure is used, all the fields from an object will be copied to the tuple.

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class hope::final< T >

Implementation of the struct like non recursive tuple which might be used to directly cast to struct with same fields because alignment of the structs's fields and tuple's fields are match.

struct used as namespace to policies which is used for tuple creation functions

Helper class for log writing, provide dispatch of the writing value according their type

Template Parameters:
Ts types which might be stored in the tuple

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
template<typename T >
static value_wrapper<T> hope::final< T >::build_value ( const T &  value  )  [inline, static]

Wrap value to store it with pretty form: [VALUE]

Friends And Related Function Documentation

template<typename T >
template<typename T >
log_helper& operator<< ( log_helper &&  helper,
const T &  value 
) [friend]

Function needed to delegate call to the same operator<<, but with a little different semantic On MSVC it does not need, but another compilers can not call function with non const reference parameter with rvalue

template<typename T >
template<typename T >
log_helper& operator<< ( log_helper &  helper,
const T &  value 
) [friend]

Central point of writing operation, provide type dispatch and call desired write method. If the type is enum and write_enum had been detected, thus it will be called If member function with signature void write(log_helper&) detected, it will be called If global function with signature void write(log_helper, const T&) detected, it will be called

Template Parameters:
T Type of th eobject to be written
Parameters:
helper Self
value Instance of the object to be written
Returns:
Self
